name: immerable-record-preact
description: Built using protoreaction, by Antonio Malcolm

engines-comments.node: using nvm to install and manage node versions (most recent stable) (https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm): $ nvm  install --lts
engines-comments.npm: using nvm to install and manage npm versions (most recent stable) (https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm): $ nvm install-latest-npm

scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:build && pnpm run clean:dependencies
scripts.clean:all: pnpm run clean:build && pnpm run clean:dependencies
scripts.clean:dependencies: rimraf npm-debug.log && rimraf .pnpm-debug.log && rimraf pnpm-debug.log && rimraf node_modules
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=preact ENVIRON=dev SERVER_SHOULD_HOT_RELOAD=true webpack-dashboard -- babel-watch ../../server/startServer.js
scripts.start:no-reload: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=preact ENVIRON=dev SERVER_SHOULD_HOT_RELOAD=false webpack-dashboard -- babel-watch ../../server/startServer.js
scripts.start:network: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=preact ENVIRON=dev SERVER_SHOULD_HOT_RELOAD=true SERVER_SHOULD_NETWORK=true webpack-dashboard -- babel-watch ../../server/startServer.js
scripts.start:no-reload:network: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=preact ENVIRON=dev SERVER_SHOULD_HOT_RELOAD=false SERVER_SHOULD_NETWORK=true webpack-dashboard -- babel-watch ../../server/startServer.js
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=preact ENVIRON=dev SERVER_SHOULD_HOT_RELOAD=true webpack-dashboard -- babel-watch ../../server/startServer.js
scripts.start:dev:no-reload: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=preact ENVIRON=dev SERVER_SHOULD_HOT_RELOAD=false webpack-dashboard -- babel-watch ../../server/startServer.js
scripts.start:dev:network: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=preact ENVIRON=dev SERVER_SHOULD_HOT_RELOAD=true SERVER_SHOULD_NETWORK=true webpack-dashboard -- babel-watch ../../server/startServer.js
scripts.start:dev:network:no-reload: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=preact ENVIRON=dev SERVER_SHOULD_HOT_RELOAD=false SERVER_SHOULD_NETWORK=true webpack-dashboard -- babel-watch ../../server/startServer.js
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=preact ENVIRON=prod SERVER_SHOULD_HOT_RELOAD=true webpack-dashboard -- babel-watch ../../server/startServer.js
scripts.start:prod-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=preact ENVIRON=prod-dev SERVER_SHOULD_HOT_RELOAD=true webpack-dashboard -- babel-watch ../../server/startServer.js
scripts.start:prod-dev:no-reload: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=preact ENVIRON=prod-dev SERVER_SHOULD_HOT_RELOAD=false webpack-dashboard -- babel-watch ../../server/startServer.js
scripts.start:prod-dev:network: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=preact ENVIRON=prod-dev SERVER_SHOULD_HOT_RELOAD=true SERVER_SHOULD_NETWORK=true webpack-dashboard -- babel-watch ../../server/startServer.js
scripts.start:prod-dev:network:no-reload: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=preact ENVIRON=prod-dev SERVER_SHOULD_HOT_RELOAD=false SERVER_SHOULD_NETWORK=true webpack-dashboard -- babel-watch ../../server/startServer.js
